blogs.author: Mario
blogs.title: Mario's blog
blogs.body:
So mario just wrote a blog for no apparent reason
The worst part about it all is that we have to laugh
and pretend its funny

blogs.author: Luigi
blogs.title: Luigi's theisis
blogs.body:
Luigi is mario's brother or is he his friend,
I really don't know I'm sure even he doesn't know these
guys are trully dumb.
